content: crochet along full video tutorial https //youtu be/y5m0qcc_seq hilde the cow is crocheted in worsted weight yarn and is approximately 5 inches tall the pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions pictures and full video tutorial to help you along the way hilde the cow is crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -magic_ring -single_crochet -single_crochet increase 2 stitches into one stitch -single_crochet decrease join 2 stitches into 1 -slip knot -chains -fastening off -attaching parts supplies needed to make hilde the cow -worsted weight yarn -e/4 3 50mm crochet hook -two 12mm safety eyes -yarn/darning needle -polyfil stuffing -scissors -locking stitch markers optional -embroidery floss bell - optional -embroidery needle bell - optional -b 2 25mm crochet hook bell - optional pictured yarn knit picks wool of the andes in cloud ~7 yards knit picks wool of the andes tweed in reindeer heather ~62 yards also pictured is amber heather and north pole heather
